website_summaries.verdict: Swissokolab’s eye gel pads make an excellent and easy addition to your nightly routine.
pros: These under eye gel pads are large enough to cover the whole undereye region
Buyers note how therapeutic it is to put them on after a long day
Will lighten under eye circles and make the skin soft and supple, too
cons: Not for sensitive skin - test before committing to using them

customer_reviews.title: Great For Puffiness Under The Eyes
customer_reviews.text: First time buyer. Been using this product 3 weeks now. Great for puffiness under your eyes. I do see some skin lighten effects for my dark under eye circles. The pads does fit well as length. My only problem was they're slippery. So, this product is best used when relaxed. However, I stored the product in the refrigerator to eliminate the product moving around & to help with bringing the puffiness down around eye area. Great for wrinkles as well.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany B.

customer_reviews.title: I like these patches so much!
customer_reviews.text: I often have dark circles under my eyes. But I'm not worried, because only 20-30 minutes with gold patches and I'm fresh again! By the way, my mom also uses this. Patches help her to fix wrinkles.
customer_reviews.author: Olena

customer_reviews.title: Actually works
customer_reviews.text: I was a skeptic about these in general but I kept seeing all the Real Housewives wearing them while getting their makeup done so I thought I must be missing out! The skin below my eyes got really puffy, dry and dark within a quick 2 week period. I thought it was just the joys of middle-age until my doctor suggested a warm cloth 3x a day. I bought these to help too and was so relieved they worked. The puffiness, dryness and discoloration subsided. I’ll be adding these to my evening prep before an event going forward!
customer_reviews.author: MoonRep

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I like to use gold eye mask every day. I get an excellent result. Moistened skin and no puffiness. It's high quality and effective product.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Jane

customer_reviews.title: Economical,convenient to use,this eye treatment is a game changer!!
customer_reviews.text: I found this product through Amazon while searching through the long line of eye creams that would help resolve morning puffiness and I will never go without this product again. The key to success is to refrigerate the whole box,apply upon awakening,washing your face is not necessary,just be free of oils that would keep the product from staying on. Every morning this is my routine while I make my bed,brush my teeth,and by the time I need to wash my face,the puffiness has decreased.An added benefit is the extra collagen that my skin needs and it moisturizes those fine lines ! Buy this product,if you want a life changer as I did!
customer_reviews.author: Night Owl

customer_reviews.title: I love them
customer_reviews.text: A lovely addition to my extensive skin care regimen. I use weekly, Monday mornings after a restful 2 day weekend off work. Love the cooling sensation. Puffiness is minimized, and gives hydration to the eye area. I would say patience is key when it comes to skin care results. Commit to a full month (even 2 months) to see real results. Delayed gratification, friends.
customer_reviews.author: angelvashir

customer_reviews.title: Puffy eyes improved!
customer_reviews.text: I really liked how easy these eye pads were to use. My aunt who’s a nurse actually recommended these to me. She’s a busy working mom and her eyes always look like she’s got a full 8 hrs nights rest. These eye pads definitely improve the look of my under eye circles. Definitely will be purchasing more
customer_reviews.author: Kara Acosta

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I think for the price, it works well. Makes your under eyes feel less puffy and give you a real refreshed feeling. I think using these right before bedtime give you the best results.
customer_reviews.author: Maryna

customer_reviews.title: Little to no results.
customer_reviews.text: Don’t see much of a difference. This picture is a before and after. (Day 3 of using the product as instructed.)
customer_reviews.author: Kristen McElheny

customer_reviews.title: Great for tired mamas!
customer_reviews.text: Thank you for helping me to hide my tired mom eyes! I have a problem with dark circles and bags under my eyes and I feel this truly helps! I’m on my 4th box.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: Better than it looks on the site. Works so good. Enjoy this eye gold mask.
customer_reviews.author: Nady

customer_reviews.title: Best Under Eye Masks I've Tried!
customer_reviews.text: I've tried several different under eye masks over the years as I've gotten older - after using these I'm done trying anything else. They are awesome! They are soft, comfortable and the effects last for hours. Especially great when didn't get a great night's sleep and it shows under your eyes, or during allergy season when your eyes are itchy and puffy.
customer_reviews.author: Krista

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: These eye masks are wonderful. They are so cooling and moisturizing. I am able to reuse the pads several times because they come in a tray with liquid that keeps them moist. I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for dehydrated and sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: Love them! I have very sensitive skin and these didn’t irritate my skin at all.. also the skin feels Very hydrated after use..!! Bought them because I hate the texture of eye creams, they feel so heavy and not really helping with dehydrated skin... also ,they feel very nice and cool on the skin, and they stay in place so I can wear them while doing something around the house , I don’t have to lay still on the bed like with the sheet masks..!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing mask!
customer_reviews.text: I love this eye mask, it’s amazing how great my under eyes feel after using it... and I’m not the only one in house that enjoys it, my husband keeps asking for it every time I use it ... normally, I’ll have it in the fridge for at least 30 min prior using it, giving it a cool , refreshing feel... definitely have seen improvement, my under eyes look less tired, well hydrated and brighter.
customer_reviews.author: Ana C.

customer_reviews.title: Helped to minimize dark circles and improved tightness of under eye area!
customer_reviews.text: These work great for my undereyes. I use them to minimize bags and dark circles and sometimes just to help me to relax. They are super soft and I definitely feel the under eye area tighten after using them.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: These under eye pads are refreshing and moisturizing my eye zone. They are perfect for morning or after a long day at work. I will definitely buy more!
customer_reviews.author: Lana P.

customer_reviews.title: Really wanted to love these
customer_reviews.text: Didn't notice much of a difference and like other reviewers said, it was difficult to keep them under the eyes. I wasn't doing anything except sitting down while wearing them and they would keep slipping off. I really wanted to love these and got them as part of a gift bag to my bridesmaids/MIL/MOB, but after 5 uses haven't seen or felt any decrease in puffiness, circles or anything else advertised. Kind of a let down.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Do not stay put.
customer_reviews.text: These worked after one shot! However you can’t really do anything while they are on because they don’t stick well and are very slippery. You need to be lying down and relaxing for them to stay put.
customer_reviews.author: J and L

customer_reviews.title: Only thing it did was give me a rash!
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t see a difference and they made my face develop a rash. You also cannot move around while wearing these otherwise they will slide right down your face. Beware if you have sensative skin like me!!!
customer_reviews.author: EMN

customer_reviews.title: Feels really hydrating.
customer_reviews.text: Gold eye mask is easy to apply, and it feels really hydrating. Quality product, very well done!
customer_reviews.author: Harry

customer_reviews.title: Bought once, now they're soliciting to my home via physical mail
customer_reviews.text: I thought this product was fine, but personally preferred another product like it for better value. The reason I'm writing this review is that the company sent me a mailer to my home address which is not okay. If I purchase a product, it's because I wanted to, not because a company is actively soliciting my business.
customer_reviews.author: K. Springer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: My wife said: I do not know how I used to live without eye masks. Although...I know. I lived with terrible dark circles under my eyes and with wrinkles. But now I always look fresh and young. Excellent quality and low price. Buy it faster.
customer_reviews.author: Leonid C.

customer_reviews.title: Be careful
customer_reviews.text: Thought this item was amazing at first, it felt great. But when I woke up the next day I had swollen red puffy under eyes. It was uncomfortable and looked terrible. I ended up going to see a dr because how bad it was. I had an allergic reaction to this. Be careful with this product, test it before you use it on your face. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Marialu88

customer_reviews.title: but they may work great for others with puffiness or bags
customer_reviews.text: I have dark circles under my eyes, and the eye masks may have made a little improvement but it wasn't anything significant for me. I used every other day for 15-20 mins until they were gone. I doubt if I will try them again, but they may work great for others with puffiness or bags?? I can only speak to the dark circle problem. Shipping/packaging were well done. Seemed like quality material with low scent (bonus for me).
customer_reviews.author: Linda M

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: This really works! I like putting it in the refrigerator beforehand overnight. I wake up in the morning, put them on, and get ready for my day while wearing them. I see and feel immediate results right away! My dark circles appears lighter and my skin is firmer.
customer_reviews.author: Farrukh

customer_reviews.title: These give me LIFE
customer_reviews.text: Usually by the end of the week I am feeling exhausted and the bags under my eyes SHOW it. I started using these a few weeks ago and every time I do, my eyes tighten up and I legitimately feel revitalized! I put them on right after my shower and do everything but my makeup to let them have as much time working on my tired face as they can, and after I let them sit for fifteen minutes or so I actually feel refreshed. I will be using these at least once a week for the rest of my life.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey

customer_reviews.title: The good point that patches are reusable
customer_reviews.text: I have tried so many masks to fix my dark circles under the eyes and nothing has worked but after this eye pads I could see a visible reaction the first time. Will try again.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Roshal

customer_reviews.title: Be careful if you have sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: This product dried out the skin under my eyes so much that skin is peaking off. It looks horrible. From far away it looks discolored but when you look closely you can see that it’s irritated and pealing skin. I had no sign anything was wrong. I used them for a week and started to notice dry scaly patches around my eye. I didn’t realize it was from these eye patches until it was too late.
customer_reviews.author: crystal magouirk

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: I have been using these for a about 2 weeks and while I like the way they feel, I've not seen a lot of difference in dark circles either immediately after use or later on. These eye pads are comfortable (best if placed in the fridge first. Don't put in freezer even for a few minutes. The cold makes the pads brittle and they ice up fast. All in all, they're nice. Somewhat moisturizing under eyes but face masks work better.
customer_reviews.author: XanyaeTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!!
customer_reviews.text: I really really like this product!! I have black eyes every time I don’t sleep enough or tired, so this is my lifesaver. I tried several different products and this is one of the best one! Totally recommend it!!! The only thing I was happy about it, was delivery. They threw it bushes and I didn’t find until couple days later. Thank you for this amazing product! Totally need to order another one:))
customer_reviews.author: valentina

customer_reviews.title: Added to my Subscribe & Save
customer_reviews.text: Love these! The yellow package is marketed towards younger crowds, or those who need help with dark circles/eye bags, and the purple is marketed towards older crowds looking for help with wrinkles. I've used both and can't say there's much of a difference except the purple box does seem to feel more tingly. These stay on great, come in easy to use single packets, and are a very affordable way to start your day with a little pampering.
customer_reviews.author: Kacie Lind

customer_reviews.title: Does Nothing
customer_reviews.text: I'm a skincare fan, and was excited about these. They are hard to get out of the package, there's excess liquid that easily spills out on you when trying to get them out, and sometimes they tear when you are trying to get them out. They did nothing for my skin and often moved on my face. Sometimes stung my face. Will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Smith

customer_reviews.title: Beauty Secret of HWOB
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I first saw the Housewives of Beverly Hills wearing them on the show before make up application. I keep them in the refrigerator and so in the am they dramatically reduce puffiness and hydrate the bags. After creating the appearance of more youthful eyes. I use them after my make up is done as well and it really gives my eyes a natural, dewy appearance which I receive compliments on. It’s a must have
customer_reviews.author: Jewls

customer_reviews.title: Soothing and Hydrating
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these every few days for over a month now. I love how hydrating it makes my sensitive under eyes feel. Once you get them in place they are cool and soothing. They stay put well. I am normally dealing with 5 kids around the house and I will forget I even have these on. Despite being in my 30's I'm very serious about the health and appearance of my skin, these are a must for under eye wrinkle prevention! As a side note I gave a pack of these as a gift and the recipient loved them!
customer_reviews.author: Busy Mommy of 5

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good!
customer_reviews.text: I have only used these a couple of times but so far, they do make a difference, particularly in the wrinkle department. Not as much in the puffy eye department. They are a little tricky to get on, but that just takes practice. It is great that you only wear them for 20 minutes then remove them as they are not particularly comfortable, then again, it would impossible for anything to be comfortable laying right under your eye. So the 20 minutes is very doable.
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: my new favorite product
customer_reviews.text: I'm very impressed with the effectiveness of this Revitalizing Golden Mask, given the low price. Some time ago I had a problem of dryness under the eyes, bags and dark circles. So, I decided to try it. I was pleasantly surprised at how smooth and delicate the skin was under my eyes. I will definitely order the second pack.
customer_reviews.author: Mila628

customer_reviews.title: I'm surprised the result is amazing. It works great
customer_reviews.text: I used the gold eye mask to reduce puffiness under my eyes. I'm surprised the result is amazing. It works great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased!
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this product! Never used eye patches before but after using this product will implement them in my weekly routine! Box includes 12 pairs of individuals packaged patches. During and after application of patches skin felt very soft and fresh! Will definitely buy this product again and recommend to my friends!
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Worthy addition to your beauty options
customer_reviews.text: These definitely help the hollowness under my eyes by puffing them up and making them more even. I like this brand more than others because they are thicker. I was offered a refund in exchange for 5 stars (hence so many other five star reviews - beware), but I am giving it four stars because the effect is so temporary, it doesn't last more than a couple hours. Nice for a spa day or feeling pampered!
customer_reviews.author: Fivelittlepigs

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed!!!
customer_reviews.text: Does not help with puffiness or dark circles!!! So disappointed. No difference at all. Been using them for over a week now.
customer_reviews.author: Joy Moore

customer_reviews.title: Worked for severe puffiness
customer_reviews.text: Still not sure if these work as well as they are described, but I do have to say I saw results. Last week I had to put my dog down and naturally I was crying for days. My face was so puffy from crying that I could barely keep my eyes open. I slapped some of these on and after 20 minutes I noticed a HUGE difference and I could actually go to work with my eyes open! As for every day puffiness, not sure if it really takes care of it...but I’ll definitely finish the pack to see if there’s a change!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Trojan

customer_reviews.title: NOT IMPRESSED
customer_reviews.text: Was not impressed didn't see any difference after using this. I tend to use more natural stuff so this felt too synthetic for me. Will not re-order but it may work for some other people. I found a ghee undereye serum works the best and helps the bags under eyes even better will last longer too.
customer_reviews.author: Ciaara

customer_reviews.title: The Under-Eye Coolant
customer_reviews.text: What I liked the most about the eye masks was the cooling factor they provided for my under-eye fatigue. The recommended time of usage for each pad was significantly less than what I used it for which was awesome! I use them on my clients in my shop as well!
customer_reviews.author: StephanieLovesAmazon

customer_reviews.title: To buy again!!
customer_reviews.text: Gold eye mask really works wonders on under eye dark circles. I'll definitely buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: Natali

customer_reviews.title: Alternative for ice cubes
customer_reviews.text: Not sure about the difference of effects between these eye pads and other cheap or expensive ones. Being on the skin, substance is first of all cools it and works just ice cubes and that's why skin becomes brighter, reducing the swelling. I don't know how they should work if you have dark circles as I don't have them and can't share my experience. So.. it's an alternative for fre ice cubes but more convenient for using.
customer_reviews.author: Margaryta

customer_reviews.title: Honest Review
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t want to make a review unless I had this product for at least a week . It super soft and relaxing but I notice it has a little tingle to it . It seems as if it’s getting rid of my dark circles but might take some time .
customer_reviews.author: Hope Hopkins

customer_reviews.title: The 24 Golden Eye Mask - skeptical
customer_reviews.text: I have very sensitive skin and these irritated the area under my eyes. not sure why.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Dean

customer_reviews.title: Saw immediate results!
customer_reviews.text: I have only used this once and the difference was amazing. I have just had cataract surgery and suddenly noticed puffiness under my eyes. I tried one pair and saw a noticeable change within an hour or so. With continued use, I hope to get rid of my puffy under eyes. I had no adverse reaction to the patches, they stayed on, and they left no residue. Looks like a winner.
customer_reviews.author: pagsag

customer_reviews.title: My eyes are shining!
customer_reviews.text: Usually, I use the eye pads for the night before an important event. In the morning I get a fresh look and well-groomed skin under the eyes. Quality and effective product.
customer_reviews.author: Maria V.

customer_reviews.title: Great eye masks!
customer_reviews.text: They're pretty great, I enjoy mine a lot. They also have this cooling effect when you wear them. A lot of the reviews say they had a hard time keeping them on/ they kept slipping but I didn't have a single problem with that at all! They stay in place pretty well (except when I'm wearing a face mask, but that happens with all eye masks for me when I do both masks at the same time). They do a good job depuffing (especially when you stick them in the fridge before using them!) and tightening/ lifting the eye areas. 10/10 from me. I'm definitely going to buy more when I run out!
customer_reviews.author: Karina Wilson

customer_reviews.title: It really works
customer_reviews.text: I always been skeptical of trying product used for under eye dark spot remedies or for puffiness. I tried everything to help reduce my dark circles and under eye bags I ’ve accumulated from years of working and late nights. Once I started using this product, I noticed a change after the 3rd uses. To be honest, even if you’ve spent your life diligently treating your skin as carefully as you possibly can, we’re all going to show signs of aging sooner or later – and that includes under-eye bags and dark circles. However, Under Eye Mask Gold Eye really works and will help leave your eyes hydrated and moisturized.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Herring

customer_reviews.title: Burns my eyes but works?!?!
customer_reviews.text: It works instantly! The puffiness & darkness settles down immediately (can’t speak for the wrinkles effect cause I’m only 23 so I don’t have any yet to speak on that feature) BUT! It’s says you can leave it on between 15-20 minutes and I usually leave it for 12-15 minutes because it burns my eyes!! There’s a tingling sensation too. I feel like it just means it’s working (which it does) but I also feel like... that’s, not, good...
customer_reviews.author: Yega

customer_reviews.title: Why does it burn, just no.
customer_reviews.text: I have used under eye products like this from sephora but when I put these on within seconds it burned & only got hotter I ripped them off & threw all away.
customer_reviews.author: Name here

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says
customer_reviews.text: I used this product for 20 minutes as directed, and you could see a BIG difference afterwards. I didnt think it would work, I just hoped it would. I only used it once so far, so I cant comment on lasting effects. I'm giving it 4 stars, because I have somewhat sensitive skin and I felt a discomforting burning sensation. Not enough to make me want to take it off, but just enough to be irritating. The feeling was gone as soon as I took them off.
customer_reviews.author: Future Queen

customer_reviews.title: They are relaxing to wear
customer_reviews.text: To be honest I’m not sure if I would purchase again I’m not actually sure if they even are working,however coming from the refrigerator they are without a doubt very soothing to use. But most definitely do not notice a difference in the puffiness.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Stillion

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Product Works well
customer_reviews.text: I have only used this product twice so far and on the second application 2 days later I saw amazing results. My eyes where not puff. The skin looks refreshed and tight not puffy at all. I will buy again and try the other products as well since it obviously worked well with me. I'm extremely happy with my purchase. I found a winner!
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Ann Correa

customer_reviews.title: Removes puffiness and skin looks lighter
customer_reviews.text: These really remove puffiness, and make your eyes look tighter! It lasts a couple days. I tried a less expensive brand that looked identical, but it didn’t work at all! Stick with these!! You won’t be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Using that mask you will see the result!
customer_reviews.text: I am very satisfied with this product! I've been trying several similar masks but none of them didn't bring the effect of rested eyes. I saw the result after 4th time of using it. Highly recommend this product! Five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Anna_V

customer_reviews.title: It really works!
customer_reviews.text: This product is comfortable and moisturizing and makes an immediate difference in the disappearance of my wrinkles. Other products that give immediate results are tightening, uncomfortable and often leave a residue that is visible. This one does not. It gives me a little extra confidence when I need it. I only wish they had an entire face mask - I end up re-wetting the patches with the leftover solution in the packet and put them in different spots on my face. I even have this on "Subscribe and Save" subscription. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: JDC

customer_reviews.title: Did absolutely nothing to skin around my eyes
customer_reviews.text: I didn't expect a miracle from those patches considering I am 48 years old and have some not deep wrinkles around the eyes. But to have absolutely no change wasn't my plan either. Would love to return them, but considering the price, and hassle of the return will keep the box.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great moisture,but they do not stay in place while moving around.
customer_reviews.text: If they would stop falling off from under my eyes I would give them the highest rating, however, the frustration of them NOT staying in place is annoying. You need to fix these so the actually stay on undereyes hole the work, please!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great eye mask
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the 24k gold eye masks. i would wear to bed. Sometimes under a sheet mask. Even when worn alone they work wonders. Saw a difference in the dark circles and lines under my eyes. definitely will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: George H

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I love these! I am very picky about what I use & will research & read reviews before I buy anything to try. I also have sensitive skin so I need to be careful. These are great! I pour the rest of the serum on them before using & will wear them while getting ready. They don’t slide down or move. I will leave them on under my eyes for maybe 20min then put them around the sides of my mouth to plump smile lines. You can see a difference right after. My skin looks refreshed & plump. I get Botox & fillers as well & it helps keep it refreshed. No irritation or anything. I love them!
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Visual reduction in dark circles and puffiness.
customer_reviews.text: Bags under my eyes get pretty bad and dark looking. I keep these in the fridge and when I put them on I can actually feel my skin tighting up as they cool down. I actually had a coworker comment that It looked like I must of gotten some restful sleep. They could tell the difference in my eye area apperance. I'm satisfied with the product and also feel good that the company helps charity with parts of the profits as well.
customer_reviews.author: Art

customer_reviews.title: I think....
customer_reviews.text: After one use: Excellent product. Easy to use. Gentle. Skin looked great after use of 20 min. Lightly tapped eyes with left over serum and slept with it all night. Eyes bags were lighter and wrinkles smoother- overall healthier looking. My goal with these is to reduce eyebags (allergies and sleeping on my face ) I’ll update again soon =) I hope company keeps price the same and continues selling on amazon. I recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Gardenia_dreams

customer_reviews.title: Ok depending on your expectations.
customer_reviews.text: They feel soft and supple on your face, and you know that your skin is absorbing the moisture products that is infused into these because they shrivel up as they dry out. I never took before and after pictures so I wouldn't say I see any sort of dramatic difference but I feel like they were worth trying.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Marrinan

customer_reviews.title: Big Improvements on Eyes
customer_reviews.text: These days when we have to wear masks on most of the times when going out, it's more important to have better looking eyes because that's the only facial part that people see. I have had dark eyes circle for a long time. After using this (switching back and forth between this gold blue patch and the gold patch), the dark eyes circle significantly improved. Easy to apply and take off after 20 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Doraemon

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this three times every other day and I already see results. It’s very moisturizing and takes away puffiness. I keep it in the fridge for and extra cooling sensation. Thank you! I think this will be a great gift for Christmas for all the ladies in my life!
customer_reviews.author: Limitless

customer_reviews.title: Moisturizing & Calming
customer_reviews.text: I have a lot of puffiness going on under my eyes because I like to work late and wake up extremely early. I had these sitting in my drawer for about a week or two before i actually tried them. Not only do they make you feel wealthy while you're wearing them (...at least they made ME feel wealthy when I wore them) they actually worked to do what they are said to do. That's a win in my book. Money well spent and money I will keep spending for these.
customer_reviews.author: Sage

customer_reviews.title: Make sure to press inti skin to release serum
customer_reviews.text: I actually really enjoy the product. I had never used these before but if you use them as directed you can feel the skin around eye area tighten. I take these to Vegas with me for th next morning so I look stunning and impossibly fresh looking after a night of adulting!
customer_reviews.author: TheChosenOne

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: These patches apply easily and are comfortable to wear around the house and doing chores or regular errands. I have only used twice. I will update my review the more I use these and share my results.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Locke

customer_reviews.title: Not sure that i saw any benefit
customer_reviews.text: they do not stay on well. i saw no benefit, but like anything cool on the eyes, it was refreshing. i gave away several of the 12 pack to friends to see if they had the same or similar experience...pretty much meh...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: These are nice I wish they stayed juicy a little longer but they do slightly plump under my eye. They also moisturize and help my dark circles a little bit. I wouldn’t say these are the best out there but for the price (I like to use them every morning) they are good
customer_reviews.author: Sk

customer_reviews.title: keep a stone face will using these, enough liquid in bad for 2 uses each, Instant results!
customer_reviews.text: Love the results, I even managed to use each set twice because the container comes with so much liquid, the results where immediate, however you have to keep a stone face for about 20 minutes because the patches are so liquidy that if you smile, make any facial expressions or try to eat with these on they will quickly start to slid out of place or down your face!
customer_reviews.author: aisha

customer_reviews.title: Any problem with keeping on, try storing in fridge!!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these masks because i have pretty bad bags under my eyes. I was having a problem keeping them on and i found storing them in the fridge really helped with that. Just like with any product, esp skin care I feel that it takes more than a couple weeks to start seeing results. With that being said i would love to keep these on my routine skin care. Your product is starting to make me feel less self conscious abour this problem.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Reliford

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: Hasn’t done anything for me. My eyes appear more puffy after using this
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 12 pairs NOT 24 pairs
customer_reviews.text: Bought to add to 12 gift bags I am making for the holiday. Pay attention to the box in the puc. It is 12 packs with 2 each in a pack NOT 24 packs/pairs.
customer_reviews.author: Posie

customer_reviews.title: Excited!
customer_reviews.text: I have used only a couple of times and I noticed a very small change but I believe with continued use, you will see an improvement. They do feel refreshing. I would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: LaVonne

customer_reviews.title: Not terrible but not amazing
customer_reviews.text: I like these, but just don't notice any difference when use them, except for extra hydration. If you don't want them to slide if your face then you have to lay down and stay skill. I like to use them while doing my eyeshadow. (Because of shadow fallout and a clean line to follow while putting on shadow)
customer_reviews.author: Lauryn

customer_reviews.title: They actually do a good job at moisturizing eye area
customer_reviews.text: They actually do a good job at moisturizing eye area. They stay pretty still on my face once I've put them in place. I find 20-30 minutes to be ideal. Would prefer less packaging, lots of plastic to go though to get to the product. Also wish they were made in the USA.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Itchy
customer_reviews.text: Really made my skin itch/burn and I don’t have sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: s.ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Great eye brightener
customer_reviews.text: These stay on (many of these undereye masks slip off easily!) and are soothing and leave your eyes much more hydrated and your circles brighter. I hoard them for traveling or for the day before a big event.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: 24K Gold is luxurious and effective
customer_reviews.text: I am always looking for "the" product that will help tone down and depuff my "been through many years" face. This product feels great, and it brightens and moistens skin. I haven't looked dewy in a long time. This gives you a bit of that va-va-ving dew back! It feels good, too. Really good.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Laven

customer_reviews.title: Little effect
customer_reviews.text: After taking off, there is a little effect, but I decided that it was an illusion of smooth skin due to a larger amount of gel, but in general, it seemed to me that the gel made the dark circles even more noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: Ameli

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I didn't believe at first, so i tried on one eye, and I noticed the difference. Sure have to use it all the time. I will use it again! Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Olga

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Hydrating
customer_reviews.text: These eye masks are amazing quality for the price. They soothe, plump, and hydrate. I like to use them while doing my eye makeup to get the added bonus of saving my under eye from shadow fallout.
customer_reviews.author: AV

customer_reviews.title: I did not see any result
customer_reviews.text: Was using for at least a month, kept in the refrigerator, as recommended. In general, nothing has changed with patches or without them. You can just use moisturizer, without any newfangled tricks
customer_reviews.author: Imogen

customer_reviews.title: Hydrating!
customer_reviews.text: So this is my second time using eye masks. I was always skeptical and never really sought them out. I saw the Gold Eye Mask Anti-Aging Hyaluronic Acid 24k Gold Eye Patches shopping for something else. I read a lot of reviews, saw the almost perfect rating and decided I had to try them. I have no regrets. At first, there was a bit of stinging when I first applied them, but that subsided after a few minutes of use. Here's a tip: leave them in the fridge for about 20-30 minutes before application. It gives a really cooling sensation and really helps with depuffing even more, in my opinion. Cheers!
customer_reviews.author: debbie J.

customer_reviews.title: I struck hold
customer_reviews.text: Great product I put them one 2 to 3 times a week first thing in morning while getting ready for work leave on and they always looking refreshed and wide awake ready to take on the day.
customer_reviews.author: M. GAECKLE

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these, I work a crazy schedule and these really help with the appearance of my under eyes! I like to put mine in the refrigerator, they feel amazing when they’re cool. They’re super easy to use and well worth taking a shot on!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica M

customer_reviews.title: These work!
customer_reviews.text: I've used these regularly for a few months and they have significantly reduced my wrinkles. I use the about three times/week. I noticed results after about a week.
customer_reviews.author: margot

customer_reviews.title: Such a great value!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried buying random eye masks in the past from stores such as TJ Maxx. I have also bought more expensive masks. This is the best one I have tried. So glad it was recommended on a "best of" Amazon list!
customer_reviews.author: Betsy

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: They don't have a lot of serum! So dry and hard to open. All the serum leaks out. I had to dip them around in the packet to get serum on the product. and didn't moisturize.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Eye Mask Review
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to apply and stayed on while I perform activities. I kept it on for 15 to 20 minutes. My eye area was moisturized. This is suitable for sensitive skin. There is enough essence left over in the package to reapply. I was looking for something to help more so with puffiness but this was fine
customer_reviews.author: Sophia M

customer_reviews.title: Leaves skin around eyes soft
customer_reviews.text: They come individually wrapped so they retain moisture. They were a little slippery at first, but they stayed on. When I took them off, I did notice a little less puffiness under my eyes, and the skin around eyes was really soft and dewy. I've only tried them once, but so far I like them.
customer_reviews.author: La Chilena

customer_reviews.title: Burned and skin went numb
customer_reviews.text: As soon as I got them situated on my face my skin burned and I took them off and then the area it they were on went numb. Be careful. Test a tiny area somewhere not noticable if you have sensitive skin. I'm bummed :(
customer_reviews.author: Mark B.

customer_reviews.title: It actually worked!
customer_reviews.text: So I have been using the golden eye masks for a few weeks and I already notice a huge difference! I have always had dark circles from stress and lack of sleep but I never found a product that actually helped. Then I came across these masks one day and decided to give them a try, and omg was I surprised!! Even after one use I noticed that my skin was glowing. Now I barely see the dark circles and I don’t have to wear a ton of makeup to hide them!! I’m definitely going to order again!
customer_reviews.author: Aaron David

customer_reviews.title: Does the job right
customer_reviews.text: I use these every morning and I keep them refrigerated prior to use. They do what they say and I use them every morning with my make up routine. They work very well and I will continue to use them daily. I have a post pic for after use and I’m turning 50 years old in March 2020.
customer_reviews.author: Justagirl

customer_reviews.title: I can definitely see a difference
customer_reviews.text: I bought these eye masks because a student of mine told me, “you have really large bags under your eyes!” Yeah it was kinda harsh but it was true. I’m an educator and also a mother of a very active toddler! The sleep I get is almost nonexistent. So I decided to try these. I was very skeptical at first but I started to notice a difference after the first few applications. I can definitely see a difference!
customer_reviews.author: LaKisha Clark

LOOK YOUNGER Eye gel pads are highly effective skin care treatment which will quickly give your eye zone hydration. 24k eye mask / under eye patches provide everything skin needs to be healthy

COLLAGEN EYE PADS include hyaluronic acid Vitamin C natural plant extracts. Gold eye korean face mask for men and women restores elasticity and firmness maintains long-lasting hydration to the eye area

NO MORE DARK CIRCLES Under eye pads are a korean skin care treatment for reducing eye puffiness bags crow's feet. Eye patches reduce wrinkles under the tired eyes helping to repair your dry sensitive skin

ANTI-AGING EFFECT of depuffing eye mask moisturizes the eye area. Under Eye Mask stimulates cellular regeneration of tired skin anti-wrinkle formula helps to rejuvenate the skin for perfect wrinkle smoothing
